title: Divine Flame (Part 2)
body:
Divine Flame (Part 2)

"What should I do now?" Walter asked with a depressed look on his face as he put away a glowing green plant inside his storage ring.

"I have collected four of the five herbs that I needed to complete the trial, but the last thing that I need to collect..." Walter muttered and thought about the hateful face of a grey-haired lazy-looking bastard.

In order to complete the second trial, he just needed to get the Nether Orchid, but he knew that it was nearly impossible for him to get his hands on it as he had already killed the person who stole it from him, and now he was completely clueless about where he had put the plant.

"I can try and look for another Nether Orchid, but I don't think there would be another hell hound in this forest," Walter said with a sigh as he knew that Nether Orchid needed the evil energy of the hell hound in order to mature, and the hell hounds are very rare monsters.
